Name: Daydream Mosaics 3: Shards Of Hope
About the game: You thought it was going to be simple? It never is! Join Juliette for a new adventure in foreign lands. - 120 Mosaic (nonogram) boards - Restore 3 ancient sanctuaries of tranquility - 4 game modes. - 9 Spot the differences mini-game scenes - 9 hidden object mini-game scenes - 9 jigsaw puzzles to complete - Unlock 11 beautiful wallpapers.
